Name: GlobalDiskGravity
Notes: A simple gravity area that pulls objects in its range towards a disk-shaped volume.

Obj_arg0.Name: Disable Bottom?
Obj_arg0.Description: If enabled, only the upper portion of the disk will have gravity.

Obj_arg1.Name: Disable Edges?
Obj_arg1.Description: If set, the disk's edges will not have gravity.

Obj_arg2.Name: Valid Degrees
Obj_arg2.Description: The radial degrees that will have gravity. Starts pointing towards +X, and then rotates counterclockwise around the Y axis. Default 360

SW_A.Description: If used, the gravity will be activated when this switch is activated.

SW_B.Description: If used, the gravity will be activated when this switch is not activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

DemoSimpleCast.Description: Continues movement during cutscenes, NPC conversations, etc.
